message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY. 

This paper describes a system for community question answering that uses both lexical and semantic-based similarity measures between text pairs. The use of distributed representations of words, knowledge graphs, and lexical databases suggests that this paper could fall under the categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and cybernetics (cs.CY).
